import polyglotI18nProvider from'ra-i18n-polyglot';import englishMessages from'./en';import spanishMessages from'./es';import frenchMessages from'./fr';export var i18nProvider=function i18nProvider(){var defaultLocale=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'en';return polyglotI18nProvider(function(locale){if(locale==='en'){return englishMessages;}if(locale==='es'){return spanishMessages;}if(locale==='fr'){return frenchMessages;}},defaultLocale// Default locale
);};
